title: ATM for OSX.org
content:
Have you signed the petition yet?   
   
"We, the designers, art directors, typophiles and other users of MacOSX ask   
that Adobe Systems Inc. address our stress and frustration by withdrawing   
its decision to only provide its ATM\*Deluxeï¿½ font management utility to   
Windows users and discontinue development of Mac versions."   
   
 [http://www.atmforosx.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526120444/http:/www.atmforosx.org/)
author: Jared Benson : Wed, 2002-07-24 10:49
